column4: IREN Limited owns and operates bitcoin mining data centers. It also provides high performance computing solutions, including Al cloud services. The company was formerly known as Iris Energy Limited and changed its name to IREN Limited in November 2024. IREN Limited was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Sydney, Australia.
